## 15.1

```{r}

lubridate::ymd("1996-11-06")- lubridate::mdy("April 30, 1777")
lubridate::ymd("1996-11-06")- lubridate::mdy("06-23-1912")
lubridate::ymd("1996-11-06")- lubridate::dmy("3 March 1847")
lubridate::ymd("1996-11-06")- lubridate::mdy_hms("Nov. 11, 1918, 11:00 am")
```

## 15.2

as.numeric() works for a, c, i
tidyr::extract_numeric() works for b, d, e, f, g, h 

## 16.1
```{r}
BabyNames %>% filter(sex== "M") %>% group_by(name) %>% summarise(total=sum(count)) %>% filter(grepl("[aeiou]$", name)) %>% arrange(desc(total)) %>% head(10)
BabyNames %>% group_by(name) %>% summarise(total= sum(count)) %>% filter(grepl(".*(jo$|joe$)", name)) %>% arrange(desc(total)) %>% head(10)
```
